Package pl.lib.model

Class Style

java.lang.Object
pl.lib.model.Style
public final class Style extends Object
Represents a visual style definition for report elements.

This immutable class defines styling properties for report elements including fonts, colors, alignment, borders, and padding. Uses fluent interface pattern for easy style configuration.

Usage example:


 Style headerStyle = new Style("HeaderStyle")
     .withFont("Arial", 12, true)
     .withColors("#000000", "#E0E0E0")
     .withAlignment("Center", "Middle")
     .withBorders(1.0f, "#CCCCCC")
     .withPadding(5);
Since:
1.0
See Also:

    • Style

      public Style(String name)
      Creates a new Style with default properties.

  • Method Details

    • withFont

      public Style withFont(String fontName, int size, boolean isBold)
      Creates a new Style with modified font properties.
      Parameters:
      fontName - font family name (e.g., "Arial", "DejaVu Sans")
      size - font size in points
      isBold - whether the font should be bold
      Returns:
      new Style instance with updated font properties

    • withColors

      public Style withColors(String fontColor, String backColor)
      Creates a new Style with modified color properties.
      Parameters:
      fontColor - font color in hex format (e.g., "#000000") or null to keep current
      backColor - background color in hex format (e.g., "#FFFFFF") or null for transparent
      Returns:
      new Style instance with updated color properties

    • withAlignment

      public Style withAlignment(String horizontalAlignment, String verticalAlignment)
      Creates a new Style with modified text alignment properties.
      Parameters:
      horizontalAlignment - horizontal alignment ("Left", "Center", "Right", "Justified")
      verticalAlignment - vertical alignment ("Top", "Middle", "Bottom")
      Returns:
      new Style instance with updated alignment properties

    • withBorders

      public Style withBorders(float width, String color)
      Creates a new Style with modified border properties.
      Parameters:
      width - border width in points
      color - border color in hex format (e.g., "#CCCCCC") or null to keep current
      Returns:
      new Style instance with updated border properties

    • withPadding

      public Style withPadding(int padding)
      Creates a new Style with modified padding.
      Parameters:
      padding - padding in pixels applied to all sides
      Returns:
      new Style instance with updated padding
